# Load data
```{r}

filenames <- list.files("data/", pattern="*.csv", full.names= TRUE) 
for (i in 1:length(filenames)){
  # extract file name
  name <- filenames[i]
  name <- sub("*.csv", "", name)
  name <- sub(".*//", "", name)
  
  # read data
  assign(name, read.csv(filenames[i], stringsAsFactors = F))
}
```
